mapper.sql: A.id as A_id,A.trade_no as A_trade_no,A.channel_no as A_channel_no,A.agent_no as A_agent_no,A.merchant_no as A_merchant_no,A.pay_code as A_pay_code,A.rate_detail as A_rate_detail,ifnull(A.order_amt,0) as A_order_amt,A.drawFee as A_drawFee,A.tradeFee as A_tradeFee,ifnull(A.merchant_cost,0) as A_merchant_cost,A.pay_trade_no as A_pay_trade_no,A.begin_time as A_begin_time,A.end_time as A_end_time,A.settle_time as A_settle_time,A.settle_merchant as A_settle_merchant,A.refund_status as A_refund_status,A.batch_id as A_batch_id,A.result_code as A_result_code,A.result_info as A_result_info,A.opt_code as A_opt_code,A.record_status as A_record_status,A.update_time as A_update_time,A.operator as A_operator,A.remark as A_remark,A.temp_1 as A_temp_1,A.temp_2 as A_temp_2,A.temp_3 as A_temp_3,A.temp_4 as A_temp_4
mapper.select:
select
from t_withdrawals A
order by
${orderBy}
mapper.insert: insert into t_withdrawals ( id, trade_no, channel_no, agent_no, merchant_no, pay_code, rate_detail, order_amt, drawFee, tradeFee, merchant_cost, pay_trade_no, begin_time, end_time, settle_time, settle_merchant, refund_status, batch_id, result_code, result_info, opt_code, record_status, update_time, operator, remark, temp_1, temp_2, temp_3, temp_4 ) values (#{id}, #{tradeNo}, #{channelNo}, #{agentNo}, #{merchantNo}, #{payCode}, #{rateDetail}, #{orderAmt}, #{drawFee}, #{tradeFee}, #{merchantCost}, #{payTradeNo}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{settleTime}, #{settleMerchant}, #{refundStatus}, #{batchId}, #{resultCode}, #{resultInfo}, #{optCode}, #{recordStatus}, #{updateTime}, #{operator}, #{remark}, #{temp1}, #{temp2}, #{temp3}, #{temp4} )
mapper.update:
update t_withdrawals A
A.id = #{record.id},
A.trade_no = #{record.tradeNo},
A.channel_no = #{record.channelNo},
A.agent_no = #{record.agentNo},
A.merchant_no = #{record.merchantNo},
A.pay_code = #{record.payCode},
A.rate_detail = #{record.rateDetail},
A.order_amt = #{record.orderAmt},
A.drawFee = #{record.drawFee},
A.tradeFee = #{record.tradeFee},
A.merchant_cost = #{record.merchantCost},
A.pay_trade_no = #{record.payTradeNo},
A.begin_time = #{record.beginTime},
A.end_time = #{record.endTime},
A.settle_time = #{record.settleTime},
A.settle_merchant = #{record.settleMerchant},
A.refund_status = #{record.refundStatus},
A.batch_id = #{record.batchId},
A.result_code = #{record.resultCode},
A.result_info = #{record.resultInfo},
A.opt_code = #{record.optCode},
A.record_status = #{record.recordStatus},
A.update_time = #{record.updateTime},
A.operator = #{record.operator},
A.remark = #{record.remark},
A.temp_1 = #{record.temp1},
A.temp_2 = #{record.temp2},
A.temp_3 = #{record.temp3},
A.temp_4 = #{record.temp4},

update t_withdrawals A
A.id = #{id},
A.trade_no = #{tradeNo},
A.channel_no = #{channelNo},
A.agent_no = #{agentNo},
A.merchant_no = #{merchantNo},
A.pay_code = #{payCode},
A.rate_detail = #{rateDetail},
A.order_amt = #{orderAmt},
A.drawFee = #{drawFee},
A.tradeFee = #{tradeFee},
A.merchant_cost = #{merchantCost},
A.pay_trade_no = #{payTradeNo},
A.begin_time = #{beginTime},
A.end_time = #{endTime},
A.settle_time = #{settleTime},
A.settle_merchant = #{settleMerchant},
A.refund_status = #{refundStatus},
A.batch_id = #{batchId},
A.result_code = #{resultCode},
A.result_info = #{resultInfo},
A.opt_code = #{optCode},
A.record_status = #{recordStatus},
A.update_time = #{updateTime},
A.operator = #{operator},
A.remark = #{remark},
A.temp_1 = #{temp1},
A.temp_2 = #{temp2},
A.temp_3 = #{temp3},
A.temp_4 = #{temp4},
where A.id = #{id}
